sentences.en: A senior White House official said the agreement is close.
sentences.cn: 白宫的一位高级官员说即将达成协议。

sentences.en: Directly after the meeting, a senior cabinet minister spoke to the BBC.
sentences.cn: 会议刚刚结束，一名高级内阁部长就在英国广播公司的电台上发表了讲话。

sentences.en: Her eventful life included holding senior positions in the Colonial Service.
sentences.cn: 她一生经历丰富，曾在殖民服务局担任高级职位。

sentences.en: I had a very high-powered senior job in publishing.
sentences.cn: 我在出版界担任高层要职。

sentences.en: Jen will be a senior this year.
sentences.cn: 珍今年将是毕业班学生了。

sentences.en: Most vacancies are at senior level, requiring appropriate qualifications.
sentences.cn: 大多数空缺属于高层职位，要求具备相应的资历。

sentences.en: Potentially high financial rewards are attached to senior hospital posts.
sentences.cn: 当上医院的高级职员就有可能享受丰厚的经济报酬。

sentences.en: Senior managers stipulated work-life balance as their main criterion when choosing jobs.
sentences.cn: 高级经理人把工作与生活的平衡作为择业的主要标准。

sentences.en: Senior politicians connived to ensure that he was not released.
sentences.cn: 几位资深政治家串通起来确保他不会获释。

sentences.en: Seniors can get a 10% discount.
sentences.cn: 老年人可以享受10%的折扣。

sentences.en: Several options are offered for the student's senior year.
sentences.cn: 为毕业班学生开设了几门选修课。

sentences.en: She became involved with a married man many years her senior.
sentences.cn: 她与一名比她年长很多的已婚男子坠入情网。

sentences.en: She was long-listed for the senior team last year.
sentences.cn: 她去年被列入了一线队初选名单。

sentences.en: Television and radio needed many more women in senior jobs.
sentences.cn: 电视和广播领域需要有更多女性来担任高级职位。

sentences.en: The most junior executive officer outranked the senior engineer officer aboard ship.
sentences.cn: 在舰船上，级别最低的副舰长也位列级别最高的轮机官之上。

sentences.en: The president has been huddling with his most senior aides.
sentences.cn: 总统一直在和最高层助理开私下碰头会。

sentences.en: The Prime Minister has the power to dismiss and appoint senior ministers.
sentences.cn: 首相有权任免高级部长。

sentences.en: the senior Democrat on the House committee
sentences.cn: 众议院委员会中的资深民主党人

sentences.en: The senior leaders lined up behind him in orderly rows.
sentences.cn: 高级将领整齐有序地在他身后站成几排。

sentences.en: the senior partner in a law firm
sentences.cn: 律师事务所里的资深合伙人

sentences.en: White men hold most of the jobs in senior management .
sentences.cn: 白人占据高级管理层的大部分职位。

words.tran_cn: 长辈；老资格；前任者的特权
上司；较年长者；毕业班学生

phrases.tran_cn: 高级管理人员，高级经理
高级会员；资深成员；资深会员
n. 大龄儿童学校（学生为英国的11岁以上儿童）

trans.tran_cn: 级别/地位高的，资深的，(比赛)成人的，高水平的
trans.tran_en: having a higher position, level, or rank

trans.tran_cn: 较年长的人，上司，资深运动员，高年级/毕业班学生
